title: Construction Site Safety Leadership Competency Enhancement Training

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Training for construction site supervisors role-playing as pre-service teachers/in-service teachers. Includes case analysis of mathematics domain applications

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core elements of safety leadership in construction sites.
Learners can apply appropriate leadership response strategies in risk situation simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose two or more improvement plans for safety culture through discussions and role-playing activities.

resources: PDF worksheet for Zoom screen sharing
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
